text: Francesco Bonifaccio was an Italian painter of the Baroque period. He was born at Viterbo in 1637, and was a pupil of Pietro da Cortona at the time that Ciro Ferri and Romanelli studied under that master. ==References== * Category:1637 births Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:People from Viterbo Category:Year of death missing
title: Francesco Bonifaccio
